Reformed Wiki Funding of 2023 Act

HB 3-093

Author: Westray

17 Dec 2023

Opening Declaration

  1. The Harlon wiki is a treasure chest of history for the server, and a guide on current events to players who are new to Harlon.
  2. In order to incentivize players to contribute to the wiki, this bill establishes a fund.
  3. This bill has been amended in order to make changes for the reasons following the Senate’s previous rejection.

Information

  1. This act will create a system in which players who publish wiki pages are able to apply for monetary rewards. This is for the Harlon wiki only.
  2. Here is how players will be compensated based on their content:
  1. Players must contribute at least two (2) wiki pages OR edit at least five (5) wiki pages with relevant information in order to qualify for funding.
  2. Once a player fulfils at least one of the requirements in subsection a, they will be able to apply for funding in future edits.
  3. The funding structure will be based on the following:
  1. Creating a Wiki Page: £25 - £75
  2. Edits between 512 - 1024 bytes: £25 - £150
  3. Edits between 1024 - 2047 bytes: £100 - £250
  4. Edits that are greater than 2048 bytes: £200 - £400

  1. Using the guidelines for the funding structure, funding will be given out based on quality and length of work. Bytes will be determined through the use of a discord bot or monitoring of the recent changes page, whereby it is stated that there is “+(x) bytes after change”
  2. Bonuses no greater than £500 may be given out to contributions that go beyond usual efforts. This may include the creation of unique graphics or designs for the wiki page.
  3. The Prime Minister will appoint a Government Media Reviewer. The Government Media Reviewer will have full discretion over how much a player is compensated for their content based on the guidelines above.
  1. Government Media Reviewers will need to seek the approval of the Ministry of Finance for amounts that exceed £400, to ensure that the government has a say in preventing the depletion of the government balance.
  1. Staff and or members of the Senate  are also welcome to make claims for this fund, however they must remove any conflict of interests. For instance, if the individual applying is also a Media Reviewer, they must have someone else review it.
  2. Players who attempt to abuse the system or exploit this act to gain money may be charged with fraud and or banned from receiving compensation in the future.

Requirements

  1. This act will require the Prime Minister to appoint Government Media Reviewers, and to create a place where players can apply for compensation for making wiki contributions.
  2. Funding must be allocated for this in the next budget. In the meantime, this act will establish a provisional budget of £10,000 until after the next budget is passed.

Implementation and timeline

  1. This act will be implemented within one week after passage.
  2. Players who already meet requirements will be grandfathered in a specific way:
  1. If a player has already created two wiki pages (or edited five) before the passage of this act, then they have met the requirements for funding.
  2. However, a player may not apply to receive any funding for wiki page contributions made before the passage of this bill. They may only use their old original contributions towards the initial requirement.

Other Information

  1. Harlon Wiki: https://wiki.harlonserver.net/wiki/Main_Page
